ValidationRule.description: Requires Case Closure Disposition on WCA, Garment Cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'WCA' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Garment' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'RCI' ) && ISPICKVAL (Closure_Disposition__c , '' ) && ISCHANGED(Status__c) && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , 'Closed' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a case closure disposition in order to close a case.
